basics.name: Fabien Kovacic
basics.label: Javascript Developer
basics.summary: I've always been passionate about computers. I started my career as a Front-end developer (html, css, javascript, actionscript3), then I evolved as a webdesigner (adobe suite). And since many years I'm now exclusively doing code, with a special interest in Javascript ecosystem (Typescript, React, NodeJS, etc)

work.name: Les Tilleuls
work.summary: Self-managed and egalitarian company (Scop), I have various missions directly at the customer. Exclusively in Javascript, I mainly work on the Front but I also have some Back missions (NodeJS). I've been in charge of small teams as a coach and technical referent.
highlights: React and Typescript expertise, systems design

work.name: CPAM de Calais
work.summary: Main mission is to improve the intranet of the social security of Calais.
highlights: Refactoring and bug fixes of the existing codebase (PHP)

work.name: Gotek7
work.summary: Short mission to enable the company to have its online store.
highlights: Design in Photoshop, taking pictures for the product sheets

work.name: Reference Hit
work.summary: Startup where flexibility was needed. I was mainly doing the design of the sites, but I often took care of their integration or development with Prestashop.
highlights: Webdesign in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator

work.name: Calais City Hall
work.summary: Give assistance in the design of a database listing all addresses in Calais.
highlights: User interface realized with Access in VBA

work.name: Naxeo
work.summary: Work-study contract, then permanent contract. Worked with many different clients (Auchan, Orchestra, Tape à l'oeil, la Redoute, 3 Suisses, Leroux, etc)
highlights: Integration of dozens of websites (HTML / CSS / Javascript)
